Downloading... APK is downloading Storage access is required to downloading the file. Storage permission request is denied. Storage permission request is granted. Wifi turned on Wifi turned off
Bluetooth is Enabling Bluetooth is Enabled Location Permission Granted Location Permission Denied Admin Removed, Please Press Home/Back button to close application version
Update Installation Starting USB Permission check unsuccessful USB Permission check successful No Attached USB Found App is Pinned, No Back, Minimize operation is allowed App is Un-Pinned, Press Back/Home to close app install_complete RESTART PHONE
Open Close Opened Closed Forward Backward Push to Enter Pull to Enter Close Door Yaw Crossed Door Open Direction Save Door is in fully closed position Use the \"Forward\" or \"Backward\" buttons below to drive the door to open position! Once the door is at your preferred position, please click the button below. Calibrate Open Position Use the \"Forward\" or \"Backward\" buttons below to drive the door to close position! Calibrate Close Position To begin the calibration process, please choose the type of the door. Please drive the door back to close position Below are some technical info for the geeks, Please confirm and click on next E.g. Conference, enter, etc… Automatic LED
Obot disconnected\nPlease check if the Obot is proper and device is near.\nClose this page and try again. Initializing Camera... E.g. Conference entry,Conference exit , etc…
Yes No Clockwise Anti-clockwise dir yaw open close Close : Open : Click on open door as many times as you like to test the set up. OPEN DOOR Click on close door as many times as you like to test the set up. Done Rescan Use the below buttons if you want clamp/unclamp the Doorbot automatically. Press the below button if you want to stop the automatic clamping process. Stop Auto Clamping Select the below option if you want to clamp the Doorbot to the door manually. Horizontal Clamp Configuration Click on \'Next\' once the clamping process is completed. Back Check to ensure door is in your desired fully Close position, then click next below Record Position Start Intent Stop Intent ACTIVE DEACTIVATE Remove / Adjust Doorbot Clamp Reset Doorbot Re-calibrate Cancel Please enter your admin PIN Please enter the door PIN Entered an incorrect PIN too many times Please enter valid door PIN Coming Soon
Includes the following steps: 1) Door clamping\n2) Doorbot Calibration Doorbot clamp will be moved to initial position Already Installed? Skip Slide the bot on the inside of the door, should\nbe placed under door handle. Click the button below once you place the bot Relax, automatic bot fasten in progress... Relax, automatic bot un-fasten in progress... Clamp jammed or extreme running, Re-try Click Manual Clamping if required. Vertical clamp is tight on the door. Proceed with caution! Horizontal clamp is tight on the door. Proceed with caution! Calibration includes following tasks: Setting door close position Setting door open position Testing the calibration Set door close position \"Click \& hold the button to move the doorbot\" Set door open position Calibration successful You can now test the calibration by clicking\non the continue below. Please toggle to close the door Please toggle to open the door Please move the door to close position.
Doorbot Setup is\nSuccessful! Re-scan Skip try again Re-Calibrate
Place the bot Auto Fasten Auto Un-Fasten Calibration Hurray! Calibration is Done Vertical Un-fasten Horizontal Un-fasten Reset ADO This will clear the data of the ADO. Do you want to proceed? Doorbot got disconnected, please try again Relax, automatic bot un-fasten in progress Relax, automatic bot fasten in progress Connecting Searching Connection timeout Starting Installation Bonding Failed Saving Installation Data Testing Please install the battery, power ON the \n doorbot and click continue doorbot and click continue Thanks for choosing the dooropen. Continue Set Re-scan Connect your device Select your device Device Address Pairing failed, Please Installation Process Place the bot Start Auto Fasten Vertical fastening Horizontal fastening Saving Installation Manual Vertical Fastening Up Down Manual Horizontal Fastening In Out Calibration Intent Switch
The Doorbot needs to reset. Is the door at close position ? Automatic :: The Door will move to close position automatically. \n\n Manual :: Please move the door to close position manually.\n Not what you are looking for? Open / Close Operation Clutch Operation Please Activate clutch Please Install & Calibrate Doorbot
Install / Uninstall Doorbot Install Un-Install Reset Configuration manual clutch Activated Deactivated Reset Calibration Clutch Switch Stop
